text.section:
Through their governing bodies, any 2 or more municipalities may:
Make and perform contracts and agreements with each other about sewerage facility:
Development;
Financing; and
Operation; and
Agree or contract with each other:
To provide for a board, commission, or other body to supervise, operate, and generally manage the sewerage facility;
To specify the powers and duties of the board, commission, or body; and
To set the compensation of the members of the board, commission, or body.

section.section: A municipality may not construct a sewerage facility wholly or partly inside the corporate boundary line of another municipality except with the consent of the governing body of the other municipality.

A municipality may not operate a sewerage facility:
For gain or profit; or
Primarily as a source of revenue to the municipality.
